H3.text: when was the first case of alzheimer 's diagnosed. 1901

A4.text: It was not until 1901 that German psychiatrist Alois Alzheimer identified the first case of what became known as Alzheimer's disease, named after him, in a fifty-year-old woman he called Auguste D.
